data.title: SonicWall Mission, Values, Culture & Jobs
data.meta_description: Learn about SonicWall's company culture, core values, latest hiring news, and evaluate if it's a potential fit for your next workplace.
data.text:
About

SonicWALL is a private company that provides Internet security solutions and appliances. SonicWALL has three business units: Network Security, Content Security, and Business Continuity. Their product lines within these business units include devices that provide a firewall, UTM (Universal Threat Management), VPN (Virtual Private Network), backup and recovery, and anti-spam / email and content filtering, as well as software and value-added subscription services.

Mission

SonicWall's core mission is centered around safeguarding organizations and individuals from the ever-evolving landscape of cyber threats. Their primary objective is to deliver cutting-edge cybersecurity solutions that empower businesses to operate securely and efficiently in the digital world. By providing innovative and user-friendly products, SonicWall strives to create a safer online environment, enabling their clients to focus on their core operations without the worry of cyberattacks.
